center-active.description: Forces the selected component to be centered.

direction.description: Switch between horizontal and vertical modes.
direction.description_zh: 在水平和垂直模式之间切换。

disabled.description: Puts all children components into a disabled state.
disabled.description_zh: 将所有子组件置于禁用状态。

mandatory.description: Forces at least one item to always be selected (if available).
mandatory.description_zh: 强制始终选择至少一个项目（如果可用）。

:max.description: Sets a maximum number of selections that can be made.
:max.description_zh: 设置可以进行的最大选择数。

mobile.description: Determines the display mode of the component. If true, the component will be displayed in mobile mode. If false, the component will be displayed in desktop mode. If null, will be based on the current mobile-breakpoint
mobile.description_zh: 确定组件的显示模式。如果为 true，则组件将以移动模式显示。如果为 false，则组件将以桌面模式显示。如果为 null，则将基于当前的 mobile-breakpoint

mobile-breakpoint.type: number / xs / sm / md / lg / xl / xxl
mobile-breakpoint.description: Sets the designated mobile breakpoint for the component.
mobile-breakpoint.description_zh: 为组件设置指定的移动断点。

v-model.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the multiple prop, this defaults to an empty array.
v-model.description_zh: 组件的 v-model 值。如果 component 支持 multiple prop，则默认为空数组。

multiple.description: Allows one to select multiple items.

next-icon.description: The appended slot when arrows are shown.
next-icon.description_zh: 显示箭头时附加的插槽。

prev-icon.description: The prepended slot when arrows are shown.

selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.
selected-class.description_zh: 配置在选择项目时应用的活动 CSS 类。

show-arrows.description: Change when the overflow arrow indicators are shown. By default, arrows always display on Desktop when the container is overflowing. When the container overflows on mobile, arrows are not shown by default. A show-arrows value of true allows these arrows to show on Mobile if the container overflowing. A value of desktop always displays arrows on Desktop while a value of mobile always displays arrows on Mobile. A value of always always displays arrows on Desktop and Mobile. Find more information on how to customize breakpoint thresholds on the breakpoints page.
show-arrows.description_zh: 更改显示溢出箭头指示器的时间。默认情况下，当容器溢出时，箭头始终显示在 Desktop 上。当容器在移动设备上溢出时，默认情况下不显示箭头。如果 show-arrows 值为 true，则允许这些箭头在容器溢出时显示在 Mobile 上。值 desktop 始终在 Desktop 上显示箭头，而值 mobile 始终在 Mobile 上显示箭头。值 always 在 Desktop 和 Mobile 上始终显示箭头。在 breakpoints 页面上查找有关如何自定义断点阈值的更多信息。

symbol.description: The Symbol used to hook into group functionality for components like v-btn-toggle and v-bottom-navigation.
symbol.description_zh: 用于钩入组件（如 v-btn-toggle 和 v-bottom-navigation）的组功能的 Symbol。

tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定根元素上使用的自定义标记。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event that is emitted when the component’s model changes.
events.description_zh: 组件的模型更改时发出的事件。
